data.name: QuaverEd Trial System
data.description:
A system that generates 30-day trials to all four products (QuaverMusic, QuaverSEL, QuaverPre-K, and QuaverHealth) - integrated with third party email system, allowing marketing to control email contents.
Built with Laravel, Vue, MySQL, Google Analytics (to track all trials to eventual sales), and Campaign Monitor.

data.name: QuaverEd
data.description: A complete redesign and rebrand of QuaverEd - complete with a unified login and registration experience across brands/products.

data.name: James E. Walker Library
data.description:
A complete refresh of the Library's entire web presence to closely match the design principles of the University while catering to
the needs of the patrons. Built on a Library-specific CMS (SpringShare LibGuides).

data.name: 'Vessel Insurance' Theme
data.description:
A complete and highly customizable WordPress theme, built for insurance agencies. The theme shrunk overall development time for each 
site by over 80%.

data.name: Vintage Burkitt Station
data.description: A complete custom design and website build, given customer specifications and requirements. Includes blog and custom form.

data.name: Premier Turf Management
data.description: A complete custom design and website build, given customer specifications and requirements. Includes Instagram integration and contact form.

data.name: Stanford Law Firm
data.description: A complete custom design and website build, given customer specifications and requirements. Includes blog and contact form.
